headline: Officials Reveal New Details of Deadly Attack on a Jersey City Kosher Market
abstract: A search of the van used by the man and woman in the attack also uncovered enough material for a second bomb, officials said.
lead_paragraph: A bomb found in the van used by the man and woman who attacked a kosher market and killed four people in Jersey City, N.J., last month could have killed or wounded people up to five football fields away, federal officials said on Monday.
